alert.note: Alert for Steuben (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Binghamton (South Central New York and Northeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 25 at 1:16AM EDT by NWS Binghamton
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southern Steuben County through 200 AM EDT... At 116 AM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Wellsville, moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Campbell, Canisteo, Lindley, Painted Post, Addison, Woodhull, Jasper, Thurston, Troupsburg and Cameron. This includes the following highway exits... Interstate 86/Route 17 between 40 and 45. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Heavy rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
